articles.description: Technical indicators suggest that the market is likely to witness intraday volatility in the upcoming sessions while bias is likely to remain in favour of bulls as long as Nifty is trading above 14,300 levels.

articles.title: RBI Warns Bad Loans, Soaring Markets Threaten Financial Stability - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The non-performing asset ratio is forecast to rise to 13.5% by the end of September from 7.5% a year ago, the Reserve Bank of India said
articles.content:
India's central bank warned that an expected doubling of bad loans and soaring financial markets in the nation's weakened economy threaten financial stability.

articles.title: Tesla launches unit in Bengaluru, names 3 directors ahead of India launch - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Elon Musk's Tesla incorporated its Indian subsidiary Tesla India Motors and Energy Private Ltd in Bengaluru on January 8. Vaibhav Taneja, Venkatrangam Sreeram, and David Jon Feinstein are directors of the new entity.
articles.content:
Tesla, the worlds most valuable carmaker, has launched an Indian subsidiary as it prepares to create a much-awaited manufacturing plant and R&D unit in India.
